description: Following last four successes we are proud to announce the 2019 edition of PyCon Sweden. This year we will have a 2 days with talks, activities and fun! PyCon Sweden 2019 will take place in Stockholm on October 31th and November 1st.

title: Building a sustainable European biofuel industry
description:
Sustainable bioenergy development relies on a combination of sustainable resource procurement, production and use of low carbon fuels and chemicals, as well as a joined-up approach to research and policy that looks at the whole energy system.

title: ATMP Sweden 2020
description: ATMP Sweden showcases the Swedish ATMP activities from Manufacture to the Market. Great opportunities to connect!
